title: Monetary Donations: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Direct your gift to an individual library or collection, or give to the University Libraries Annual Fund, which supports the acquisitions that build the research strength of the Libraries' collections and bolster Northwestern’s academic programs. Supporters who make leadership gifts of $1,000 or more annually to University Libraries are recognized with membership in the Deering Society. Give to the Annual fund Contact Jennifer Mullman, Director of Development for the University Libraries, at 847-467-7278 or jmullman@northwestern.edu.
